Summary: two large bright as the sun objects were hovering for about 15 seconds ,gone in blink of an eye
divs: Sighting Detailsjust before dark on july 10 2012 ihad been out watering the garden.i came inside and sat down in my chair .from my chair i look out over the lake and can see for miles.i had been only sitting for maybe a minute when two bright lites caught my eye out the side window.i looked at them for a couple of secounds before i relized what i was seeing.the two objects were as bright as the sun,one was like a blob of lite,like a small sun.the other was cigar shaped with round circles running the link of it.i jumped out my chair and startled my wife who was washing the dishes.i headed for my deck to get a better look.i bent down so i could keep my eye on them as igot to the deck i stuck my head out the door and for about a split second they just were there and then they were gone.i dont know what i saw,but what ever it was i wasnt the only one who had a sighting that nite.there were many reports of something in the sky that nite,my sighting was before dark,just at dusk.our local paper reported many reports of 911 calls that came in.thats makes me feel a little better,im not just seeing things.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Petoskey
There were 2 other sightings in Petoskey on or around July 10th 2012
